about.title: about
description: I'm a passionate web developer dedicated to crafting responsive websites where technology meets creativity. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript and frameworks like Vue, Nuxt, I focus on building user-friendly interfaces optimized for all devices.

My logical mindset and creative flair drive me to create effective, visually appealing web solutions. I continuously learn new technologies to deliver high-quality products that meet user and business needs.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.text: I’m interested in job opportunities. If you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me
